data.comment: The first-half is in progress. Belenenses get the game underway.
Belenenses to take a throw-in in Farense territory.
In the minute 1, Farense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Manuel Mota signals a Belenenses throw-in in Farense's half.
Farense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 5, Farense have been awarded a corner by Manuel Mota.
Eduardo Mancha's header is off-target for Farense.
Belenenses have a goal kick.
In the minute 5, Can Farense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Belenenses's half?
Manuel Mota blows against Farense's Brian Mansilla for offside.
Throw-in for Farense in their own half.
In the minute 7, Manuel Mota awards the home team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Belenenses is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 9, In Lisbon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Tiago Esgaio for Belenenses gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Manuel Mota awards Farense a goal kick.
In the minute 10, Throw-in for Farense in the half of Belenenses.
Throw-in for Belenenses at Estadio do Restelo.
Throw-in Farense.
In the minute 12, Corner awarded to Farense.
Farense push forward at Estadio do Restelo and Eduardo Mancha gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Belenenses defence.
Farense have been awarded a corner by Manuel Mota.
In the minute 13, Manuel Mota signals a free kick to Belenenses in their own half.
Can Belenenses get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Farense's half?
Throw-in for Belenenses close to the penalty box.
In the minute 14, Throw-in Belenenses.
Throw-in for Belenenses in the half of Farense.
Throw-in for Farense in their own half.
In the minute 18, Free kick for Farense in their own half.
Corner awarded to Belenenses.
Belenenses's Ruben Lima gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Farense defender.
In the minute 20, Ball safe as Belenenses is awarded a throw-in in their half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Lisbon.
Farense have been awarded a corner by Manuel Mota.
In the minute 22, Corner awarded to Farense.
Belenenses awarded a free kick in their own half.
Belenenses to take a throw-in in Farense territory.
In the minute 24, Manuel Mota signals a Belenenses throw-in in Farense's half.
Throw-in for Farense at Estadio do Restelo.
Edi Semedo for Belenenses is whistled offside.
In the minute 26, Free kick for Belenenses in their own half.
Farense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Manuel Mota signals a free kick to Belenenses.
In the minute 29, Silvestre Varela (Belenenses) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Free kick for Farense in the half of Belenenses.
Farense drive upfield and Brian Mansilla gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Belenenses defender.
In the minute 30, Farense are pushing forward but Claudio Falcao's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Belenenses at Estadio do Restelo.
Brian Mansilla of Farense smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 32, Manuel Mota signals a free kick to Farense in their own half.
Farense drive forward but Brian Mansilla is judged offside.
Nikola Stojiljkovic (Farense) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 37, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Farense have a dangerous throw-in.
Manuel Mota awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 39, Henrique (Belenenses) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Belenenses.
Farense to take a throw-in in Belenenses territory.
In the minute 40, Throw-in for Belenenses at Estadio do Restelo.
Tomas Ribeiro is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Manuel Mota signals a Farense throw-in in Belenenses's half.
In the minute 42, Tomas Ribeiro returns to the field for Belenenses after picking up a slight injury.
Free kick for Belenenses in their own half.
In the minute 43, Farense's Claudio Falcao is back in action after a slight knock.
Henrique is back on his feet again.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Claudio Falcao for Farense who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Manuel Mota waits before resuming play because Henrique for Belenenses is still down.
In the minute 44, Richard Rodrigues of Belenenses is pulled up for offside.
Belenenses pushes forward through Edi Semedo, whose finish on goal is saved.
Belenenses have been awarded a corner by Manuel Mota.
In the minute 45, At Estadio do Restelo the fourth official shows that 1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Free kick Farense.
In the minute 45, Ball goes out of play for a Belenenses goal kick.
The first-half has ended.
Afonso Taira for Belenenses has been booked by Manuel Mota and receives a first yellow card.
Manuel Mota blows to start the second-half. Farense with the kick-off.
Farense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Farense.
In the minute 46, Afonso Sousa is on a sub for Richard Rodrigues for Belenenses.
In the minute 47, Farense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Lisbon Belenenses's Edi Semedo is caught offside.
Manuel Mota signals a free kick to Farense in their own half.
In the minute 49, Manuel Mota signals a free kick to Belenenses in their own half.
Manuel Mota awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in Belenenses.
In the minute 52, Corner awarded to Belenenses.
Belenenses have been awarded a corner by Manuel Mota.
Farense awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 53, Ball safe as Belenenses is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In Lisbon, Ryan Gauld (Farense) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 55, Belenenses have a goal kick.
Manuel Mota awards Belenenses a goal kick.
Manuel Mota signals a free kick to Farense.
In the minute 56, Belenenses needs to be cautious. Farense have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick for Farense in the half of Belenenses.
Ball goes out of play for a Belenenses goal kick.
In the minute 58, Can Belenenses get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Farense's half?
Throw-in for Belenenses in the half of Farense.
Belenenses drive upfield and Ruben Lima gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Farense defender.
In the minute 59, Belenenses have been awarded a corner by Manuel Mota.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Lisbon.
Belenenses's Mateo Cassierra is whistled for offside at Estadio do Restelo.
The home team have replaced Edi Semedo with Robinho. This is the second substitution made today by Petit.
In the minute 60, Petit (Belenenses) is making a third substitution, with Mateo Cassierra replacing Caue.
Throw-in for Farense in the half of Belenenses.
In the minute 62, Goal kick for Farense at Estadio do Restelo.
In Lisbon Belenenses attack through Silvestre Varela. The finish is off target, however.
Throw-in for Farense in their own half.
Manuel Mota awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 67, Sergio Vieira is making the team's first substitution at Estadio do Restelo with Hugo Seco replacing Bilel Aouacheria.
Farense have been given a penalty at Estadio do Restelo...
In the minute 68, Ruben Lima (Belenenses) gets a yellow card.
Ryan Gauld converts the penalty to give Farense a 0-1 lead.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 71, In Lisbon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
At Estadio do Restelo, Henrique has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Farense push upfield and Claudio Falcao gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Belenenses defence.
In the minute 72, Throw-in for Belenenses in their own half.
Manuel Mota signals a free kick to Belenenses.
Ball safe as Farense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 73, Can Belenenses get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Farense's half?
Corner awarded to Belenenses.
Corner awarded to Belenenses.
In the minute 75, In Lisbon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Manuel Mota signals a Belenenses throw-in in Farense's half.
Pedro Henrique is replacing Brian Mansilla for Farense at Estadio do Restelo.
In the minute 76, Sergio Vieira (Farense) is making a third substitution, with Jonatan Lucca replacing Nikola Stojiljkovic.
Farense have been awarded a penalty in Lisbon...
Jonatan Lucca (Farense) places the ball on the penalty spot ... And fails to net!
In the minute 79, Jonatan Lucca for the away team is judged to be offside.
Free kick for Belenenses in the half of Farense.
Bruno Ramires is replacing Afonso Taira for the home team.
In the minute 81, Belenenses make their fifth substitution with Francisco Teixeira replacing Danny Henriques.
Belenenses to take a throw-in in Farense territory.
Throw-in for Farense at Estadio do Restelo.
In the minute 85, Fabricio Isidoro is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Belenenses to take a throw-in in Farense territory.
Fabricio Isidoro has recovered and rejoins the match in Lisbon.
In the minute 87, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Manuel Mota blows against Belenenses's Mateo Cassierra for offside.
Filipe Melo (Farense) has replaced the possibly injured Fabricio Isidoro at Estadio do Restelo.
In the minute 89, Free kick for Belenenses in their own half.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 6 minutes of added time.
Free kick Belenenses.
Can Belenenses get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Farense's half?
Mateo Cassierra (Belenenses) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Throw-in for Farense in the half of Belenenses.
Goal kick for Belenenses at Estadio do Restelo.
Farense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Manuel Mota signals a Farense throw-in in Belenenses's half.
Farense have been awarded a corner by Manuel Mota.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-1.
Farense are down to 10 men after Pedro Henrique has been shown a red card.
Goal! Bruno Ramires levels the match at 1-1.
